Articles.Content: While in flight, space but suborbital, I checked the map and when I came back I was so far away from my craft I couldn't see it. When I zoomed in it wouldn't zoom all the way and the camera view stayed so far away that it compromised my ability to function. I have a video of it but don't see any way of uploading it.
Sorry, we can't host images or videos here. It requires too much bandwidth. But you can host them on sharing services and use the links they provide here.
